page.title: 06Lees Factory
page.content: {LEES FACTORY Lees factory is situated in{Whifflet, Coatbridge.The factory produces sweets like Mint Cream,Macaroon and Snow_ balls.Someone out of our class inven_ ted a name for a Lees product. The name she invented was{Spacelogs.}We tested the bar and you can get flavours like cola,raspberry and caramel.Lees is a very large building with at least 150 machines that make these products.It was started by {John J Lees}in 1932.They send their sweets all over the world and they have a slogan{"Lees Lees more if {you please".
